description: This file is a shell script used for restoring default gateway and LAN settings, configuring system parameters, and performing self-healing operations on a network device or gateway. It includes commands to set various device parameters, modify configuration files, and execute scripts related to device management and recovery.

methods.name: _update_db_value
methods.description: A function that updates specific key-value pairs in the syscfg database file by setting certain parameters to zero.
